name: 萌えChu! ほのか&らん
summary:
ほのかちゃんとらんちゃん、
あなたはどちらがお好み？
優しくキスしてあげてください。
--
Ultra-high resolution
Cute HONOKA or sweet RAN? Which do you prefer?
Ultra-high resolution
Cute HONOKA or sweet RAN? Which do you prefer?
Give her a gentle kiss.
Each girl has different reactions according to the time of the day.
HONOKA is a graceful and well-groomed girl.
RAN is a bit strong-willed and TSUNDERE type.
WARNING
Keep your screen clean and avoid excessive moisture.
If the screen is damaged or scratched, please do not use it, as injury may result.
Please mind the sound.
Android 2.2 or later
Requires Adobe AIR.
